greetingRow.title: Hello! Welcome to the master of building cargo flow maps!

uploadDataRow.title: Data uploading
uploadDataRow.text: Upload a .csv file (comma separated) with cargo flows data

linearScaleRow.title: Linear scale settings
linearScaleRow.text: Specify minimum and maximum line width in a ribbon using the slider or set values manually

nodesSettingsRow.title: Transport nodes display settings
nodesSettingsRow.nodesSettingsSliderText: Specify minimum and maximum radius for circles of settlements using the slider or set values manually

greetingPanel.greetingPanelText: Hello! Welcome to the master of building cargo flow maps. If you want to work with your data, upload it using a special form. If you want to familiarize yourself with the functionality of the application on pre-prepared data, click 'Demo'. Enjoy it!
